Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Miles C
Reviews.Content: Nothing wrong here. The location was excellent for our needs. Very easy access to the 101 and 118 both of which we used checking out the town and was easy to get to Malibu which is my favorite place to just drive around and maybe walk the beach, but I also did Universal which was also a short drive away. Doesn't seem like the best part of town so very thankful for the gated parking lot.Room was perfectly clean and tidy which is my worst fear when staying in a hotel. Even the pool and spa looked clean and well maintained. Didn't go in the pool as it was still a bit cold. But everything was absolutely as it should be or better for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great place terrific value...”
Reviews.Author: bermurray
Reviews.Content: It is easy to see why this hotel is well-rated. Excellent value, clean and the people are friendly and the breakfast great. Free parking and WiFi do not hurt the value either! Well done, we'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “I couldn't have been more pleased!”
Reviews.Author: Lindsey G
Reviews.Content: I booked 2 nights via my Wyndham Rewards account and had planned to arrive early on the first day. However, because of unforseen circumstances, the train and public transportion schedule had me arriving at 1am on my first night. I was beyond nervous about arriving to the location so late because I had never been this area or hotel before, nor had I ever taken the train or public transportaton in the L.A. area before. So, to ease my my conscience, I called ahead and spoke to the daytime staff to make sure my reservation and check-in would be stress free upon arrival. To my dismay, there was a hang up with my credit card used for the reservation. The staff member on duty took down my phone number to see what he could do to help out and call me back. I have to admit I was somewhat surprised when he did exactly what he promised he would do. He assured me that they could work with me at check-in to make sure my room would be ready for me upon arrival, even though he would be off two hours prior to my arrival. And he did just that. I arrived at 1 am via the city bus (which was quite clean and secure btw) and checked right in without a hitch! As far as my two days stay: The continental breakfast was neatly presented in the lobby with seating indoors and out for a pleasureable experience. They didnt have any qualms about bringing a plate to your own room for enjoyment either. The site felt very safe and secure, which was key, as I was a single female traveling alone for my first time to LA. They also had complimentary fresh baked cookies in the afternoon/early evening, which I thought was fantastic. Overall, the property was in excellent condition, thefront desk and maids were exceptionally friendly and accommadating, and the location was very convenient. Definitely would reccommend this Howard Johnson to any type of traveler without any reservations.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: zomgitsally
Reviews.Content: Great staff, great quiet, clean room and a great stay! Breakfast was tasty and simple. Thanks for a lovely, pain free stay.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Accommodating Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tim D
Reviews.Content: I stayed 3 nights with a group. We were spread out in 3 rooms and the open-air hallways provided easy access amongst our rooms. The hotel was secure with an atrium-like center which houses a pool and patio and an overall good size as it was a short-walk from one end to the other. It is also conveniently located next door to a CVS which was a good fit for food and forgotten items. The staff was more than happy to help meet our needs. Overall, I recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: Jeremy P
Reviews.Content: The Howard Johnson and its staff were so very helpful to us during our stay. We had big boxes that we couldn't take with us when we checked out and they let us store them in their conference room. They even shipped the boxes for us the next day. This hotel is fantastic and I highly recommend it to anyone in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff and Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: leap14
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Howard Johnson for three nights for the SAE Aero Design Competition. The staff was most accommodating to extraordinary needs and extremely willing to please their customers. The hotel was kept up well and the beds were clean and very comfortable. Overall a very enjoyable stay! We love to come back to this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel”
Reviews.Author: textiletyke
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights in the valley to be near family. Rooms were very clean, though I didn't realize I was booking a suite but it was on short notice. Didn't sleep well first night due to noisy traffic in hallways second night better for I slept in second room away from hallway. Neighborhood not my cup of tea You definitely need a car if you want a good place to eat all the good places on Ventura Blvd. If I didn't have my handicapped permit, parking would have been a problem for much of the rear lot was taken up by Verizon telephone trucks. For me I prefer to stay with family next time I'm in the valley

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Highly recommended!”
Reviews.Author: Feistywingnut1
Reviews.Content: We spent several days here as a result of the reviews on TA and were very pleased with the accommodation. Our room was large with two queen beds, a good sized bathroom and plasma screen TV. It looked like it had been recently decorated and the sheets and room were spotless. There is complementary wifi and onsite parking together with a buffet breakfast which is the standard breakfast you get when you are given a complementary breakfast. It's not too far from Universal and a great deal less expensive than hotels nearer to Universal however the roads in LA are very congested so it will take you longer than you think to get there from here. We had dinner each night in a vietnamese restaurant which was just up the road. There are several but this one was really busy each night. The food was good and very reasonably priced. The surrounding area doesn't look great but the hotel is well located as a base for travelling to other destinations. The hotel was well run and great value for money and I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, quite reasonable.”
Reviews.Author: dadtravails
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night when my son was auditioning at CSU Northridge. Upgraded to a suite very reasonably, which allowed him to practice while I went to sleep. Rooms were clean, large, comfortable and surprisingly quiet for a location on a busy street. The beds were very comfortable. Gated parking was a plus, it was really nice to not have to feel you had to unload the car. The wifi connection was excellent. Front desk staff were very helpful with directions and were able to do some emergency printing for us. The breakfast was welcome as we didn't have to stop elsewhere in the morning, but nothing out of the ordinary.

Reviews.Title: “HJ Reseda CA”
Reviews.Author: sandro s
Reviews.Content: Verry nice Hotel, Clean, good breakfest, just perfect!! I recomend !!

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay - value for money!”
Reviews.Author: marlok1
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel based on the tripadvisor reviews and we were not disappointed. The hotel was easlily accessible from the "major freeways", but you definitely need a car to get around. Reseda is not an upmarket area but neither are many places in LA itself.The hotel is surrounded by auto repair shops, but that was not a big deal as beyond them are the lovely mountains. We were given a room on the ground floor which was next to the pool. As there was a bit of a noise from the pool filter we reported this to Michelle at the reception. She called her manager and immediately got us an upgrade to a bigger room on the first floor. Although there was no lift that was not a problem at all. The room was nice and clean, had a fridge, coffee maker and toiletries. The heating and cooling though it worked well was a bit noisy. On the w/e we could hear the people and the tv in the next room but it was fine for the rest of our stay. There was secure parking at the back of the hotel which was great. The wifi access in the room was one of the best we have experienced till date. There was no room safe, and that would have been a bonus. There was a free continental breakfast served between 0630 and 0930 everyday. This consisted of danish pastries, muffins,bagels,toast,cereal, juices,coffee and tea, which was a good start to the day. The fruits esp the oranges could have been of better quality.There was a microwave which you could use as well day or night. There are several shops/restaurants in the vicinity and a coin laundry nearby. Overall the manager and receptionists were very helpful with all sorts of local info and also printed out our boarding passes when we were leaving. Overall we had a good time and enjoyed our stay at the Hojo in Reseda and would recommend this hotel without any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great value, recomended”
Reviews.Author: camperbear
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights last week, with our 26yr old daughter and 3yr old grand daughter, rooms were large and comfortable, very clean, great beds very comfortable, very nice pool and hot tub which our grand daughter loved. Excellant service, staff was great very helpfull, we were visting family nearby and would stay there again. THe price was very competitive and we were very satisfied, the gated parking area was a huge plus, the area is not bad but not great, never felt unsafe but the gated parking was nice, the CVS pharmacy next door was nice for last minute and late night runs for forgotten items. recomend!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Two nights vacation”
Reviews.Author: TravelingPam
Reviews.Content: We spent two nights at the Howard Johnson in Reseda. The price was right - $71 a night and not far from the attractions (Universal Studios, Hollywood Blvd.) The room was very modern and clean, large with a flat screen TV. The only real concern was the noise - while you couldn't hear your neighbors, it was very loud just outside the door. You could hear people talking outside and walking along the hallway. The free continental breakfast was average - bagels, cereal, juice/coffee, muffins. The fruit looked a bit old. Overall I would stay there again because of the good value and accessibility to attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and reasonable price in convenient location.”
Reviews.Author: HighlandMommy
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by this Howard Johnson. I highly recommend this hotel if you have to stay in this area. It is very reasonably priced and convenient to many places. They were helpful when I needed to make a change on the phone before arriving. Rooms were very clean, wi-fi was free and facility was safe and secure. Very good experience. I will stay here again in the future when I have business in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Price and Service”
Reviews.Author: Joan P
Reviews.Content: I was hesitate on booking the rooms, because it showed Reseda. But after checking on map quest it showed 2 miles from CSUN Northridge University, and 1 mile from the Hospital. I needed a place to stay while looking for an apartment around the University, so I called the hotel and spoke to the Manager Mina.... She was so pleasant and explained every detail about the hotel safety, bus schedule & Stops for the school, explained the continental breakfast, free parking and the free WI/FI. Wow! so I decided to book, I was still nervous, because I was traveling with my daughter, since we live in a small town. I was truly amazed when I walked in, the lobby and the fresh smell of the cookies was amazing. The front desk was very polite and gave me coupons for the eateries close by. When I went to the room, everything as described was included, clean and perfect. The next morning breakfast was just like the manager said.I could have paid $150 + dollars at the at the Hilton or Marriott and breakfast, WIFI and parking would not be included. SO THIS IS A DEAL OF A LIFE TIME.... I was pleased and can't wait to go back to pick up my daughter and stay at the Howard Johnson again. Thank you Mina and to all your wonderful staff.

Reviews.Title: “We'd stay again”
Reviews.Author: Amador
Reviews.Content: We got a two room suite for $105/night, a very good deal. The rooms were clean and large and well lit - very pleasant. Wireless internet (free) was good, and we appreciated the free USA Today each weekday morning. The locked parking lot seems like a good idea, given the diversity of the locals. Front desk staff was very pleasant and helpful. The only downside is the rather spartan breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay for the business traveler”
Reviews.Author: Cory D
Reviews.Content: Short commute to Northridge (10 minutes), felt safe/secure. Plenty of gated parking, noise in the hallways was a bit annoying - replacing the room doors would help out a lot here. Business center would be nice, or at least a complimentary printer/copier. Continental breakfast needs help, no hot items unless you want tea or instant oatmeal. Would stay there again and recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “lovely stay- dont count on the continental breakfast”
Reviews.Author: VeredMBS
Reviews.Content: we stayed at the hotel for 3 days in January 2012. It was a great stay concerning the clean rooms, the free WIFI and the friendly service. the hotel is a bit far from the LA center- about 25 minute drive to any attraction and the continental breakfast includes assorted muffins and danish, cornflakes and coffee. not a continental breakfast in my opinion but for the price that we paid, they overall experience was very good!

Reviews.Title: “A Very good deal!”
Reviews.Author: Olasek
Reviews.Content: Very nice, updated rooms. Had a super quiet night. Reliable Internet connection and speed was important for my son.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pati-chueca
Reviews.Content: This is a very convenient hotel, we had a car rental and therefore was easy for us to move around in LA, I would recommend you to stay here if you do have a car and you dont mind too drive around 20 min to be in the center or to go to the Universal Studios. We certainly enjoyed our stay, it was a short one, only 3 nights, but worth it, the price was convenient, the room was clean and spacious and the staff was very helpful. There is not much around, I mean if you want to go out and just walk to different restaurants, this is not the place for you. But as we were looking for an economic alternative to LA this hotel suit our needs. I will recommend this hotel again to those that are practical, dont mind to drive a few minutes to go to different touristic areas in LA and that want to save some money.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Happy - Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: Usuff
Reviews.Content: After much careful research on this website, chose this hotel as had the best ratings and best positive comments. Booked it for two weeks. I wasn't disappointed. Lobby has a spacious feel to it. Room was large, clean and nicely furnished. Also especially quiet, as a room away from the main road was requested. Hotel staff were always alert and friendly. Gave us good advice about traffic conditions, shopping, helped print out my Universal Studio tickets, and even a researched for me a list of places to get my rental car checked out (I hired it in San Fran, was at a lost where to take it in LA after the maintenance light came on.) This was home away from home. Only drawback was a lack of microwave in the room (used one in lobby.) A large, gated secure car park area at the back of the hotel gave extra peace of mind. Starbucks, Jewish supermarket, CVS, Dennys, laundromat a couple of minutes away. Reseda Boulevard where the hotel is located is a wide, relatively quiet road. Has a safe, upmarket feel to it. Loved our stay! Will make it our base again for my next trip to Los Angeles. Thank you Sheila and Adrian. You were especially helpful and friendly. I thought hard about whether to make this review as I don't want the price to go up (is very reasonable) or have the hotel booked out.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location for exploring”
Reviews.Author: jJNB
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here on several occasions in the past dating back to when this was the Reseda Inn. It has had its "ups" and "downs" and since becoming Howard Johnson definitely on the "ups". Rooms were large and well furnished. Small pool and spa. We chose it mainly for reasondable rates and as a convenient location for visiting family in Northridge, but if you don't like driving in L.A. there are convenient Metrolink stations at Northridge or Chatsworth for connections to all points. Easy freeway connections if you don't mind driving.Ronald Reagan Presidential Library and Museum is about 25 miles, but easy freeway connections. Many good restaurants up and down Reseda Boulevard. Enclosed parking lot and security locks on rooms. Will probably make this our "base camp" on next trip from Texas. Also , considering the number of motels listed, this is definitely in one of the top rated.

Reviews.Title: “beach visit”
Reviews.Author: Jae K
Reviews.Content: my girlfriend and i were visiting santa monica and i didn't want to spend a fortune for a hotel that was only going to be used for sleeping. the amenities didn't matter too much since we had no plans on staying in much. this Inn was only a few minutes drive from santa monica pier and close to freeways which made is easy to return home. Pro: the price for a single king bed was dollar for dollar better than most of the hotel prices in santa monica and along the beach. the room was clean. the facility parking and entrances were gated so only card holders could enter (other than through the lobby). bathroom was exceptional and the flat screen tv helped make it more modern and up to date. the staff was very friendly and always said hello (even housekeeping). don't know many guest were staying at the time but it was quiet during the night. no footsteps from above or outside. heater/ ac ran quite. Con: the location isn't the best. prior to getting there i was expecting the area to be a little better since CSU Northridge and an upscale shopping mall wasn't too far from the Inn. maybe i was just expecting too much of a deal. the continental breakfast was "okay". muffins, coffe, and cereal. chanels programed into the tv was bad. many choices but most wasn't worth it. KEEP the "channel guide" in site because you will need it to input the chanels yourself. got a little annoying.

Reviews.Title: “The most fantastic place you can stay at!”
Reviews.Author: Linazepeda
Reviews.Content: My stay at Howard was the most amazing. Their service is very welcoming! I felt comfortable. They attended to all my needs. I am definitely going back!!! I recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: “Good option to explore L.A.”
Reviews.Author: patm82
Reviews.Content: We really liked this motel and the price is nice. However it's not exactly in the middle of L.A., but that didn't bother us. Just keep in mind that the traffic in the L.A. area is somewhat annoying - so avoid the rushhour! The staff was really friendly and helpful, the room was nice and clean. They serve complimentary breakfast which was really ok.

Reviews.Title: “Made a bad situation GREAT”
Reviews.Author: therealroxanne
Reviews.Content: I was forced to leave my apartment for 2 days for some maitenance which turned into 3 days...the staff was WONDERFUL...I stayed with my husband and 4 small children...it was like a VACATION for all of us. It was very clean inside the rooms and the hotel overall (lobby, etc). The refridgerator didn't work but they replaced it immediately. My kids liked the complimentary breakfast. We had a wonderful stay, if I ever have family/friends in need of a hotel will RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL!!

Reviews.Title: “Good price but just doesn't really cut it”
Reviews.Author: HornetBrad
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a cost-effective base in LA as we read such good reviews about it. Cheap it certainly was but unfortunately it didn't really offer that much quality. We werre given one of their better rooms which overlooks the pool area. Unfortunately it was so dark in there we had to have all the lights on all day. This made the room feel very small and dingy. The actual room quality was ok - fairly standard; good TV, small bathroom. The breakfast was passable but nothing to write home about - toast, bagels, coffee, spreads. We were told it was a good location for getting downtown in LA and although technically it's only a few miles from Hollywood, the traffic was horrendous every day so took us an hour or so to get just a few miles. It's a mix of a residential/business neighbourhood - not brilliant but not too dangerous. There are some nice restaurants near the universirty which is a short drive away. Overall, it was just about acceptable as a bed for the night but I wouldn't recommend spending any leisure time there.

Reviews.Title: “very nice 8 day stay”
Reviews.Author: dingo_pup_1
Reviews.Content: 8 days of fun my wife and i had a great time at this hotel very clean rooms staff great manager very helpful safe place to be. we were out at night and people there very nice breakfast was spot on anyone one who said this hotel was bad go down street there might be a 6 star hotel more to your liking . rooms excellent .everything you need is next door very helpful transport on doorstep you don.t need a car to get around as i found out and any help you need just ask the friendly staff and they will bend over backwards to help you .will be back soon as i can robert and jan holland melbourne australia PS see you soon guys thanks for the great time 10/10

Reviews.Title: “Ok”
Reviews.Author: cmsrosa
Reviews.Content: Room and bathroom were clean, oudoor pool. The receptionist (I think called Jose) was very helpful. Beakfast selection was large. Quite far from main attractions in Los Angeles, but it was relatively low price and clean. Good enough of us for one night.

Reviews.Title: “Second time I have stayed here for two weeks”
Reviews.Author: Robert P
Reviews.Content: The staff are friendly and helpful, The room was very clean which is vert important, I will be staying again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stop”
Reviews.Author: John J
Reviews.Content: Was going through Southern Cal on visits to colleges. This was a fine place. The staff did not keep up with the breakfast bar that morning. I had to ask for cups and more coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Madjude
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 nights in room 104. Room was a good size with a fridge, tv and nice bathroom. Hotel has been recently renovated so it is all modern. Free car parking. Area seemed safe. Spa was closed due to maintenance. Foyer area is very nice and breakfast was adequate. Staff are very friendly and helpful. We had a car so transport downtown was no problem. Not sure what the public transport is like in the area but LA does lack in that department compared to other large cities in the USA. For us clean is important and this hotel ticked all the boxes.

Reviews.Title: “Great room for the money”
Reviews.Author: Christina G
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights here, and the room was awesome. Everything was updated...flat screen TV (decent size) and granite countertops, even in the bathroom. Very clean and quiet. Nice pool and hot tub area. The front desk staff was very helpful when asking about places to go. Would highly recommend this hotel. The only minor thing was the distance from the attractions in the Hollywood/LA area. It was probably about a half hour especially with the traffic, but I would still stay here again since it seemed like a safe area. Great room for the money!

Reviews.Title: “When in L.A. we will use this hotel again.”
Reviews.Author: Hendrik L
Reviews.Content: We stayed four nights at this HOJO, and enjoyed each one of them. Spacious room, spotless clean. Adequate breakfast. Easy location for L.A. visits. Good value for our money. Highly recommended. Friendly staff. Front desk professional and more than helpful; they went out of their way trying to print our boarding passes, in vain and only to discover later that an airport authority had to manually check our passports, the same ones on which we entered the country... When in L.A. again we will use this hotel as our base for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Wasn't on holiday was the only draw back”
Reviews.Author: forwardplanninguk
Reviews.Content: My company paid for me to attend a conference in LA and they picked a cracking hotel great food great staff great room just a shame I was working will be going back but this time on holiday

Reviews.Title: “My Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: Dennis J
Reviews.Content: I would advise anyone traveling in the area or if you just need a night away from your home, to go to the Howard Johnson Inn & Suites on Reseda Blvd., Reseda, CA. Everything is always excellent and staff will do all possible to accomodate you. Never a problem! As the title says My home Away From Home.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, poor service”
Reviews.Author: Alexandra S
Reviews.Content: The rooms were great, but the service was poor. The gentleman at the front desk was not the nicest. He seemed to be annoyed if you asked him anything. We also had the smell of some marijuana in our hallway for most the night.

Reviews.Title: “BRAVO - A Really well done job !!!”
Reviews.Author: Jul1910
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for money!!! Great location, 7 minutes drive from the 101and 15 minutes from the 405 (the two arteries of LA). Staff - true pros. Juan Villa - the shift manager is a true canonball - efficient, curtious, zeilous.. The room was very nice and clean. The breakfast was fair (lets have some more vegetables) Handicapp: there's a fire station nearby - judging from the amount of exits with full horn and sirens, LA must be on FIRE!!! But be sure - I would come back again... Well done HOJOS..... I enjoyed the stay and would come back for sure

Reviews.Title: “Definately a good choice!”
Reviews.Author: Bella1021
Reviews.Content: My b/f and I stayed at the Hojo for 4 days when visiting Los Angeles, and it was definately a good choice! We were in room 102, and it had a nice large king size bed with clean sheets and a very nice and clean bathroom! As you might be able to tell, cleanliness is very important to me, and this place exceeded my expecations for this price range!! There is a CVS Pharmacy right next door and the Hwy 101 is just a 5 minute drive away. The surrounding area I wouldn't say is the most safest looking, BUT with the location being only a 30 minute drive away from all the main attractions that LA has to offer, it was well worth it! There was a continental breakfast which consisted of toast, bagels, cream cheese, grape jelly, danishes, muffins, apples/oranges (if you woke up early enough to get to them), some cereal and limited instant oatmeal (again, this is if you woke up early enough to get to it). The orange juice I wasn't really too fond of, but overall the free continental breakfast was pleasant! Definately stay here if going to LA - you will save lots of money!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay and we will be back!”
Reviews.Author: Renald H
Reviews.Content: Our room was nice and clean, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The staff made every effort to make sure we were comfortable with our room. The hotel was in walking distance of the event we attended. I will definitely use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “We would most certainly visit HoJo Reseda again”
Reviews.Author: Jari K
Reviews.Content: HoJo Reseda met out expectations. We were looking for a place to rest while visiting LA (from Finland); reasonable price, free WiFi, adequate breakfast to start a day, comfortable rooms for the family of four. Hojo Reseda is a pleasant base for families visiting LA area. There are several attractions and shopping malls only 20 minutes away. Some attractions, of course, are further away like Disneyland but the personnel is eager to help you to navigate through LA. I personally would also like to thank the management for handling their responsibilities very well. You can actually yourself notice it when browsing through reviews and see how they respond to feedback. Bottom line is: Our family recommends HoJo Reseda.

Reviews.Title: “Great price for the area!”
Reviews.Author: thursowick
Reviews.Content: Pros: Clean, comfy rooms; large bathroom; parking lot with electric gate, to keep out the riff-raff. Cons: Breakfast is mostly sugary fatty muffins, sweetrolls, etc.; I was woken up every morning at 6:30-ish as people would stomp past my room to go to the breakfast. I swear the walkways amplified every step ten-fold.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it. Hope WeÂ´ll ever have the chance to come back!”
Reviews.Author: mauros88
Reviews.Content: The experience was great considering the price we paid for the room. Room was big and cleant. Comfortable bed and Good Cable TV. Pool not great, but I think that is not very importante if you are in LA. Good location with Highway to all the touristical points of interest. The crew was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “we would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: parisimo
Reviews.Content: we stayed four nights here and always felt comfortable and welcome. We took a suite for only a few extra dollars and were glad we did. The extra space, two flatscreen tv"s and two aircon units made a difference. The reception staff were knowledgable about the area and public transport in particular which was very helpful. The hotel is not new but has been refurbished recently. All in all, a good value stay.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay”
Reviews.Author: BearTravels33
Reviews.Content: Had stayed at this hotel a few years ago so I thought I would try it again. Room was clean and the check-in was fast. The secure parking is also a bonus. As was the case last time, I did not partake in the breakfast they provide but it does appear to be the usual continental breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: jmattix1
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. Convenient to the local attractions. Staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was large and very clean. Felt very secure staying here. They recommended us to a restaurant that couldn't have been better. Overall on our trip this was one of the best.

Reviews.Title: “Great for a cheap stay north of central LA”
Reviews.Author: Mic93
Reviews.Content: Stayed 3 nights on our roadtrip, and it was really value for money. Close to all major sightseeing points, and easy access to freeway. Free parking and WIFI. Nice clean and big rooms. The small pool in the center of the hotel was ok, and so was the free breakfast. We would for sure stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good for the price- Clean- Nice Staff”
Reviews.Author: jasmine1166
Reviews.Content: We came to visit with friends to tour LA. Area was pretty good. Rooms were very clean. The only problems were, the walls are thin- you can hear your neighbor talk and shower in the morning, and the keys didnt work to the entry gates. You had to try a few times to get them to work. Otherwise the hotel was newly remodeled, clean rooms, towels, very nice overall. Had complimentary breakfast until 9:30 am with good variety and the staff kept the warm food coming.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised! Very small, but overall outstanding! Will come back!”
Reviews.Author: gogetsun
Reviews.Content: Especially appreciated the very nice staff and immaculate condition of the room. The full handicapped tiled shower was outstanding!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for the $”
Reviews.Author: likestotravel020
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my daughter while we visited CSUN and familiarized ourselves with the Northridge area. I found the hotel to be very clean and the room looked recently renovated. The carpet appeared new, the linens were fresh and clean. The towels could have been a bit plusher for my liking, but they were new. The beds were very comfortable, as were the pillows. I found the room quiet and it did have a window that opened, which is always a must for me - as I am not a big fan of air-conditioning. The continental breakfast was more than I expected and fresh baked cookies were available all day long at the registration counter. The hotel personal were courteous and helpful. As I will be in the area often in the near future, this will be my destination for nighttime lodging. If my impression changes, I'll update my review.

Reviews.Title: “Ok..”
Reviews.Author: lormae
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for one night in June. It was ok for an overnight stay but not somewhere I would want to stay for an extended stay. Jose at the front desk was great and very helpful. He does his job well and should commended for his customer service. The room felt a little musty and could have used new carpeting. Like I said, it's ok if you are passing through and need a place to stay for the night. It's not a bad hotel but just not what I was expecting when I booked the room. Also, I had a really hard time maintaining a connection with their high speed internet. I ended up using the mobile hotspot on my phone.

Reviews.Title: “Great service for a budget price”
Reviews.Author: dibs63
Reviews.Content: This is a budget hotel with exceptional service. It is a little outside the main areas of L.A. but being a car based city this is not really a problem. The freeways were busy both days we travelled into the city so it is a consideration. Our room was spacious, clean and well equipped. There is secure, free parking at the rear which is handy if your room is at the back. The corridors were a bit gloomy and there are no lifts, which was not a problem to us, but may be to others. The big plus point of the hotel was the front desk and in particular Jose who was an absolute credit to Howard Johnson. Nothing was too much to ask and he took great care explaining any answers to questions we had about L.A. He was knowledgeable, informative, friendly and welcoming. All in all we would highly recommend this hotel, it is budget but exceeded our expectations.

Reviews.Title: “If possible I'll be back”
Reviews.Author: nestor_oz
Reviews.Content: Pros: Nice staff, good price, very comfortable room, clean and have been recently renewed, Location It's good if you plan to visit LA & Hollywood area. Cons: The neighborhood isn't very quiet, but is near LA, so it's normal

Reviews.Title: “The hotel and the staff were great!”
Reviews.Author: gessa30032003
Reviews.Content: I don t have any remarks. Th staff was really friendly and helpfull, unbelievable! This is how it always should be. The rooms were clean. The buffet was not big but was nice. The swimming pool could have been larger. We loved it!

Reviews.Title: “Happy with it”
Reviews.Author: Victoriakm
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights, in a smoking room because it was cheaper when we booked (we used air freshener and it was fine). The only question we can raise in regards to the smoking is that when people were smoking cigars by the pool, we could smell it in our room, so surely the non smoking rooms could smell it too? The bathroom was a decent size, and the bedroom had enough room. The breakfast was average- toast, muffins, bagels, juice, coffee etc. There are complimentary cookies at the desk (think Subway style but better) and Jose who worked in the afternoons was great. He had a joke with us when checking in and was a great help when we lost one of our keys (he even remembered my name). The location was good for us since we didn't want to pay LA prices, and we came from Disneyland the first day. LA traffic is horrendous at the best of times, so it took a while to get to the hotel, but the wifi was great and there is gated parking at the back of the hotel if you drive.

Reviews.Title: “After 20 years, HoJo was even better!”
Reviews.Author: BananaBender1
Reviews.Content: Reasonable freeway access from LAX, local traffic is very manageable for Right Hand Drive visitors. Secure parking outside rear bedrooms. If Jose is behind the desk, it's your lucky day. His generosity, helpfulness and local knowledge are exceptional. We are 3-star people - our room and facilities exceeded our expectations. Windows can be opened for those who like some fresh air. Handy to a convenience store, good restaurants and Mall shopping. Secure WiFi room Internet access iced our cake!

Reviews.Title: “great value for LA area”
Reviews.Author: rthrbtrvln
Reviews.Content: i believe the management has changed recently and you can see improvments in the works. the place is spotless, the rooms are newly renovated and the beds are very comfortable. the parking lot is off limits unless you're a guest which is good in this case since the neighborhood is just okay. the pool and jacuzzi looked clean but we didn't use them. the courtyard is under a bit of construction, not sure what they're doing with it. the breakfast was the usual continental fare; cereal, juice, toast and danish, coffee and tea. there is a nice thai place across the street and within a few blocks some great mexican food. the owners are very pleasant and run a nice place, i highly recommend if you're in the LA area to make this your base; it's clean and safe and for the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: City of Big Bear Lake, California
Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: breno29
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had to attend our daughters commencement at CSUN and we needed a place to stay since her class was going at 8:00 am and we live out of the area. We are very pleased at the staff and most importantly the room. When they say no smoking room it really was. I have a very sensitive nose and I can tell. The bedding was so clean and comfortable. Not even a speck of dust in the bathroom or the bedroom area. Very quiet hotel. The only thing is there is no elevator so if you need that remember to ask for a ground floor and the staff will take care of it I am sure. Even the parking area is behind a security gate. The drive to CSUN was about 2 minutes up Reseda blvd and a Right onto Prairie where they have people directing traffic. The whole thing was a pleasure. If ever I or someone I know needs a place to stay It will here again. For the price you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: “excellent location”
Reviews.Author: vardonhouse
Reviews.Content: extremely well run personal establishment! Helpful staff and sqeaky clean

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to stay this is”
Reviews.Author: Damion1973
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 8 nights and im so glad i did. I felt very safe here. The staff here are very friendly and amazingly helpful. Its in a good location. The only downfall is the rooms have no safety deposit boxes but dont let that put you off staying here, you wont regret it :-)

Reviews.Title: “Best value for the price”
Reviews.Author: mmk418
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in other Howard Johnson before ,which I had very unfavorable view about staying in another one again but this hotel changed my mind. The staff , service and cleanliness of this hotel were great . I definitely recommend this to others. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, price, very clean rooms, located centrally”
Reviews.Author: MeekoandLinds
Reviews.Content: I checked for hotels in the Hollywood/Los Angeles area and many came up. I narrowed it down by price. Trip advisor came up with several hotel options. Howard Johnson/Reseda was one of them. I checked their reviews to all the others and this one came up with a high rating. I also checked the Howard Johnson, Reseda website which gave me a virtual tour of the property. This also helped us to make the decision to stay there. I can honestly say that our stay was extremely pleasant. The service and personnel were outstanding. The rooms were remodeled and clean and they even provided a continental breakfast. Everything about our stay was great. We were located centrally to Universal Studios, Magic Mountain and Hollywood. We had a great Spring Break and would definetely return to this hotel and recommend it to our family and friends who may be Southern California bound.

Reviews.Title: “We will use this hotel as our base for LA”
Reviews.Author: Pamela091
Reviews.Content: Like other reviewers, I found the staff friendly, and the rooms very clean, everything worked. Other guests seemed happy, too. I was thrilled at how quiet it was, as if management spaced rooms apart for privacy. We took Sherman Way to the 405 in 10 minutes, and got around to Pasadena, Downtown, Santa Monica, without much traffic between 9:30 am and 3:00 pm and after 7:00. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific value, great service”
Reviews.Author: Ignat2
Reviews.Content: Atul and Sheela Vanmali are ultimate hosts which was reflected in the natural and effortless hospitality they and their staff offered to this weary traveller. The overall experience and accommodations were great -- thanks Andy, Sheela, night and morning front desk, and housekeeping!

Reviews.Title: “Surprising Find”
Reviews.Author: MaureenMI
Reviews.Content: I picked this hotel because it was the closest to our daughter's. What a delightful surprise: the registration and check out were professional, courteous, and efficient. Free internet and tables to use it in the room. The countertops in the bedroom and bathroom were granite. The lobby was spacious and the included breakfast [with a copy of the LA Times] lovely. The hotel has a pool and hot tub--which we did not use. It is across from the fire station, but could not hear any noise in the rooms. Gave us discount coupons for Denny's nearby. Also nice Thai restaurant nearby. I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very happy I chose this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Vicky58106
Reviews.Content: I am from Washington, D.C. and visited my son who is a student at CSUN, Northridge. I was very pleased with my stay here. All of the staff was very friendly and they provided me with whatever I needed. The complimentary breakfast was good and the atmosphere was wonderful. I stayed for 5 days and really enjoyed my stay. The rooms were very comfortable and I was pleased to have free internet. I will definately stay there again, my next visit. Thank you HOJO!! You Rock!! LOL

Reviews.Title: “For these rates: a steal!”
Reviews.Author: gnup2
Reviews.Content: I'd like to start off by reacting to the person reviewing this hotel earlier (2 or 3 below mine): I do get around (since 1985, many many countries visited from the US to Indonesia, from South Africa to Uzbekistan, etc), but I don't care a great deal for luxury. I do care about cleanliness (which I found here) and friendliness (which I found here). Above all, I want to be comfortable, which I was. Good beds, clean (renovated) rooms, free and secure parking, a safe location (not as sketchy as some reviewers make it out to be) and trustworthy and friendly staff. The breakfast was fine by me: cereals, fruit, juice (from a Minute Maid machine), small muffins and bagels. I'm from Europe, I won't mention the coffee, which is a hard thing to come by in the US if you like it tasty, aromatic and strong. All in all, my friend and I were very satisfied with our stay at the HoJo in Reseda and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “I'll come back to this hotel =D”
Reviews.Author: ariGarcia
Reviews.Content: It was a little hard to find but the friendliness and attentiveness of the staff made it worthwhile. The room was very decent and clean. The price was accessible and if you mention that you got the info from this website, you might get a discount =D (depends on the hotel if its available, it was when my boyfriend and I stayed)

Reviews.Title: “In town for business”
Reviews.Author: turtlelo
Reviews.Content: Had a show in town and booked 12 rooms for my employees. Not a single complaint. We all enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “I must not have stayed at the same place folks here are describing”
Reviews.Author: Metacomet
Reviews.Content: Booked 2 nights at the Reseda HoJo, pretty much because of the stuff folks here are saying. What a joke. I guess people don't get around much. This place is a standard, tired, old, dingy, stucco, musty, 2 story Southern California motel, in a sketchy area of the San Fernando Valley. To be ranked #9 in the Los Angeles area here says a lot about the desirability of even going to that part of California. Easily the least appealing place I have been in the last 10 years. These comments are specific to the physical property. It is pathetic. The continental breakfast is a hoot also. The staff was helpful and went our of their way to make the magnetic cards, which were of a similar quality to the rest of the place, even work. All in all, if you need a cheap motel in the San Fernando Valley, this works but by all means do not expect much.

Reviews.Title: “pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: JuanneCosta
Reviews.Content: This is a a great hotel, and a great value. The staff were helpful and pleasant and the room and bath were very clean. Good breakfast and a secure parking area. If you're with a car in LA, this is the best hotel you can choose!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff, clean rooms, and a great value for the dollar. Only one caveat........”
Reviews.Author: Bill94536
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a good quality hotel recently remodeled, friendly and courteous staff, and centrally located in the Valley, this is the place. The manager also upgraded us for free to a suite at no extra charge. The rooms are very reasonably priced as well. The only draw back is that is sits across the street from a fire station. The night we were there, they went out on about 4-5 calls and the sirens did disturb our sleep. But if you are in L.A. area looking for a great hotel, and a great value, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value & Super Staff”
Reviews.Author: FMC42
Reviews.Content: Hotel was quiet. Room was clean and the staff was super. Neighborhood is not chi chi, but plenty of shopping and restaurants nearby. Has a secure parking area.

Reviews.Title: “excellent value”
Reviews.Author: 33possums
Reviews.Content: A clean hotel with helpful staff. A good comfortable base. Great to get something so pleasant for uner $100

Reviews.Title: “Most gorgeous rooms, would definitely come back!!!”
Reviews.Author: off2fly
Reviews.Content: My family and I came all the way from Japan. We chose this hotel based on the reviews of the trip advisor. The reviews were definitely right. This place is so well maintained. We were warmly greeted when we checked in. We arrived a bit before check in and yet they checked us in no problem and gave us our room. The ladies at the front counter even informed us about the fresh baked cookies that would be available to us guests later. Anyway we went into our room and wow! So gorgeous. Impeccably clean from top to bottom. The whole room smelled so fresh and clean. The colors in the room so comforting and nice. Our two sons said, "wow what a beautiful room." My husband and I agreed. The bathroom was amazing, I mean seriously amazing. So fresh new and clean. I admit I am a bit picky about hotel rooms. But I tell you honestly, there is not 1 bad thing to say about this place. It not only met our expectations it exceeded them. Seriously the rooms are so modern and clean you'll enjoy your stay here. The flat screen TV in the room and everything else. Just all of it. Also, the free breakfast was really nice. My kids enjoyed the cereal and both apple and orange juice. My husband and I meanwhile enjoyed the breakfast danish and muffins and I also had a nice bagel with butter which I toasted in the morning in the breakfast area. And nice hot coffee. The next time we go to California we will definitely be staying here. And I most definitely will be recommending this place to all of my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Spotless”
Reviews.Author: pelican2770
Reviews.Content: This is a great place. It feels like 5 star service. The rooms are great, very clean and the complimentary breakfast is great. I like the secure parking lot. Its a bit out of the way but with a rental car its no problem getting around. The rates are great if you can get a discount. I have stayed several times. The last time there was noise problem with the automotive repair shop next door. Apparently they wanted to work late, revving up the car engines so loudly it set off car alarms. I went out to the parking lot and tried to speak to the mechanic through the fence. He was rude and uncooperative. I rang the police since Los Angeles has a noise ordinance and they said they had had other calls as well. Once the police arrived all was quiet. The next night they worked right up until 10pm and then it was quiet. Having stayed there often over the last few years I think this was an isolated event with a certain night owl worker. It will not stop me from staying there again. When I mentioned it to the front desk in the morning she offered to move me to another room on the other side of the hotel which I did not do (pretty well settled in for several nights). The staff is great, I highly recommend this motel.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and great staff”
Reviews.Author: hpov
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with the family and booked two rooms begin of October for three nights. Good rooms definetly worth the money. Location is good if you want to visit Universal Studios or northern parts of L.A. Staff was always friendly and very helpfull. Will definetly recommand this for short term stay to visit the northern parts of L.A.

Reviews.Title: “accomodating”
Reviews.Author: 33031Bigkahuna01
Reviews.Content: we have a very positive experience here. everyone from the time we checked in all the way to check out. everyone was very friendly and helpful. i would very definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: cosifan
Reviews.Content: We paid $84 for a night on Dec. 30. I don't think it is worth it, especially if you are sensitive to noise and air quality of the room. I was greeted by a not-so-friendly gentltman at the front desk. No greetings. No explanation on direction to the room and amenities. The hotel looked like a run-down place from outside, but the room we stayed looked to be recently renovated as the sign outside said. However, there doesn't seem be to any insulation and the room smelled terrible and stale. My family is sensitive to noise and air quality. I woke up at 2:30am in the morning and couldn't go back to sleep. I heard someone taking a shower at 4:30 in the morning. It sounded like I am in the bathroom. The breakfast was so low quality and made Mc Donald a 5 star restaurant to us. The picture they put on the website doesn't convey the right atmosphere. Since it was our first stay in LA, I can't compare it with other hotels. However, please do your family a big favor and look for other options hard.

Reviews.Title: “Clean , Quiet , Comfortable and Top Value”
Reviews.Author: Neonlight
Reviews.Content: Nice and very clean rooms with comfortable beds , flat screen TV and free high speed internet.Bathroom with granite tops.Very friendly management and incredible staff. Free secure parking and a nice neighborhood. Definitely my favorite Hotel in LA with the best value.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel when visiting LA”
Reviews.Author: Cholako
Reviews.Content: I just loved the hotel. Everything was great from the beginnig. Parking lot is free and big. Room looks like Hojo rooms look like all around the world: clean, carpeted, LCD TV, HD channels, free wifi, free continental breakfast (many travellers here complained about the breakfast; depending on how you like breakfast you will or will not like this one. If you're used to breakfast buffet with eggs, bacon, pancakes and so on, forget it, thi is not the hotel for you. But, if you just want your breakfast to be a hot beverage, some pastries or cereal, fruit, juice and toast, this will work perfectly for you!). Staff was always helpful and really nice, especially Neth and Nina (i'm not sure about this name) that helped us a lot with directions and good advise regarding not only attractions in LA, but also in Cambria and San Francisco. Regarding location, if you have a car you will have no problems at all, because you will be close to San Diego Freeway and 101 also (these two lead you to the main attractions in LA). And Reseda is so quiet! If you don't have a car, I would do some research first if this hotels will work for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: BlueLiz02
Reviews.Content: Clean, Comfortable, great hair dryer, felt secure, would definitely stay there on next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, Close and Clean”
Reviews.Author: Jilly_J_Bean
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I stayed here recently based solely on it's location (within a mile of where we were visiting for a friend's birthday party). I was surprised at how clean it was. Clearly it has recently been renovated and the staff were very nice. The parking out front is very limited but I think there's a larger lot out back. Lots of families with small kids were taking advantage of the free pastries and juice in the morning. It's not in the part of The Valley or LA that you would call touristy or even remotely interesting but it was perfect for what we needed.

Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: BigSkySam
Reviews.Content: I booked a three night stay here based off the reviews in Reseda, and I'm very glad that I did. Was very easy to find this place, and had plenty of parking (Including a nice secure area at the rear of the building). A sign above the place announced that it was "Under new management", which at first was a worry (I once stayed in a place that was under new management, and wished I hadn't). These fears proved to be unfounded however. Checking in was nice and easy, thanks to the staff. If I remember correctly (And I had a 5 hour drive to get here so I was very tired) the Lady that checked me in was originally from Hammersmith. She was extremely pleasant and helpful, and an added bonus was that I'd been upgraded to a suite for my stay. Lobby was open-plan and bright, with breakfast served there in the morning. Lots of touristy leaflets and pamphlets available too. My room was upstairs on the right side, overlooking the Pharmacy next door. The room was big, with a living room area that lead through to the bedroom with a separate door between the two. There was also a little fridge that had a counter above it (I used this to organise my packing, very handy). The bathroom was compact, but spotlessly clean with lots of towels and plenty of hot water. The internet signal was strong, as I was able to Skype without any line issues. Had a TV in the bedroom and one in the living room, which was a nice touch. For the price I paid, this Hotel was an absolute gem and I was very impressed. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, Very Trustworthy and Honest”
Reviews.Author: MadB63
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hojo Reseda for three nights. Upon checkout I had some valuables in my purse, and my very expensive ring must have fallen out as I was getting my morning coffee. I didn't even realize that it had fallen out of my purse, until the Manager called us while we were driving back to AZ. She explained that someone had found something and turned it in, and was I missing anything. I was so shocked to discover that I did not have my ring in my purse, not to mention it's value and that someone had turned it in, and that the Manager was trustworthy enough to call us. In these day and times it is nice to know that this particular company still embraces a certain high level of integrity, ethics and trust. Thank you, to Mina and her staff.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay in LA and has free parking and WiFi!”
Reviews.Author: futuremrsrobinson
Reviews.Content: We just got back from our trip and read a few newer reviews. This hotel is NOT the Universal Hilton and if you want to pay $300+ a night, stay there. This hotel is around $70 a night and offers incredible service for the price. They have a pool and a hot tub. I didnâ€™t use the pool since it was cold, but I did sit in the hot tub for awhile and I loved it. The pool area isnâ€™t as nice as a resort (think Disneyland), but again, youâ€™re not paying $300+ a night here like you would there. The parking is free and gated. The rooms were recently renovated. The breakfast, while very basic, was good. One day, they found out that we were going to Hollywood and recommended parking at the Renesisanse Hotel. It was only $2 for us to park there! The hotel is about 15 minutes or so from Hollywood (about 30 minutes if the traffic is bad). The hotel is not perfect, but similar hotels are priced at or over $100. Itâ€™s NOT a dump and we felt very safe inside of our room. The rooms had a nice shower space and a nice HDTV TV. They also have cookies available when you check in. Another good thing to note is that the Internet is completely free and worked very well. The password should be on your room keys when you check in. We have problems getting online at most hotels and were very pleased things went well here. Should it be in the top ten best hotels in CA? I think it depends on what youâ€™re looking for. This hotel was in our price range and exceeded our expectations. Keep in mind that everything is more expensive in LA (and any bigger city) so $70 a night here for this place is a good deal. You might find some nicer places at a similar price point online, but keep in mind that they probably charge for parking, internet, breakfast, etc. All of these things are included in the rate here. I also slept comfortable which resulted in a great stay. If youâ€™re looking for a great place to stay, sleep, and relax in the Hollywood/ Burbank area, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: lv2trvl88
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice hotel considering the location. Having grown up in the SFV, I knew Reseda wasn't the best location but was pleasantly surprised at how nice the hotel was. Very clean rooms and roomy. Nice staff and lovely continental breakfast. The flat screen TV was a hit with my husband. The only thing that could be improved is to title your wireless internet connection. There were quite a few to choose from and it was hard to figure out which one was from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service and wonderful time”
Reviews.Author: corrermucho
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel based on the reviews and the price. I took my high school cross country team to California from Arizona and wanted to be near our race, near Magic Mountain, and close to the beach. There was a little mix up on the reservation (due to the school and not the hotel). However, the manager Andy, resolved the problem and was able to give us the rooms. I appreciate the friendliness of the staff and their cooperation. The rooms were nice, clean, and very comfortable. There are plenty of eating places close by and CVS is right next door. I appreciated the free and secure parking. If I am in the area again, I would definitely choose this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Like my other visits amazing”
Reviews.Author: saeed100
Reviews.Content: I like this place. Service, Cleaning, Facilities, free internet, very nice room and facilities, free continental breakfast We dont talk about 5 stars Sheraton in Dubai and somewhere with hundreds of dollar per night, we talk about this nice hotel with 70 something per night. What I needed more. I will be there for all my travel to Los Angeles

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms & service for a small price”
Reviews.Author: DelaZ
Reviews.Content: I found this hotel through Tripadvisor. I stayed at this hotel with 2 friends for 5 nights. The rooms are quite large with a nice bathroom, airconditioning, Flatscreen TV and comfortable beds. You can park your car at the back, the parking is closed of with an automatic port. In the morning you get free breakfast and there is free internet in the rooms. Internet be slow sometimes but it's good enough to check your mails. The staff was also very friendly and helpfull. There is also a small pool and jacuzzi which we used once. Very good value for a small price!

Reviews.Title: “The Price Was Right”
Reviews.Author: rockhudson45
Reviews.Content: To Mina, Shaela, Neneth, Andy, and Bobby and all the rest of the staff: Blanca and I want to thank you for helping to make our week stay in your motel so enjoyable. The morning breakfast and coffee was just icing on the cake. Our rooms (were stayed in 3 different rooms were always very clean and neat. We enjoyed having the small refigerator as it added to our comfort. We will tell all our friends to make sure that they stop buy and stay with you when the need arises. Again, you warm personalities were a nice change in the normal cold receptions you can get with other accomadation. See you on our next trip to the U.S. Sincerely, Ed and Blanca Sherbok (from Guatemala)

Reviews.Title: “Great value, Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: happyfr0g
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel based on the reviews on Tripadvisor and the price which was quite lower than other hotels I looked at. We spent 3 nights at this hotel and had a very positive experience. Before we even got to California there was a problem with our reservation (my doing, not theirs) and when I called the hotel to straighten it out, they were wonderful and were able to ease my worries about it. When we got there we were impressed by the cleanliness of the lobby and the freshly baked cookies at the front desk. Our room was clean and comfortable, I slept well every night. My husband really liked the granite bathroom and side tables as well as the flat screen television. Housekeeping did a great job cleaning the room each day. I did find the internet somewhat slow but I am used to a very high speed connection at home. The breakfast was the typical continental style with muffins and cereal. We didn't eat breakfast at the hotel because I need more than carbs to start my day. We were fine with the location. It's close to Ventura freeway so if you have a vehicle it's fast to get to other LA areas. The best thing about our stay was the service at the front desk. They kept asking if we were ok and if we needed anything. The lady during the day even offered us coupons to local restaurants which we appreciated. We hope to come back and stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hotel, excellent service, very comfortable & the best staff”
Reviews.Author: Irishlad018
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a few days on my way from Australia to New York. I wasn't looking for an expensive or fancy place to stay and after searching on TA I thought Howard Johnson was perfect for me. As it wasn't very expensive I wasn't expecting much, but I was pleasantly surprised! The place was fantastic! I really enjoyed it! The staff were amazing! Extremely helpful and very nice. I even left some of my belongings behind me and I got an email straight away informing me. Excellent service. I couldn't recommend this place enough!

Reviews.Title: “Not the place to stay if you want to be near CSUN”
Reviews.Author: CABozeman
Reviews.Content: I am sorry to say that this was NOT a nice stay. I had to change rooms because of noise , but it didn't matter. Apparently the rooms have no insulation. The breakfast is meager at best. The coffee weak. The staff is OK. Internet slow. The location is poor, not near anything of quality. My suggestion:stay at the Staybridge in Chatsworth.

Reviews.Title: “nice big room in a noisy hallway with partiers, very poor internet service”
Reviews.Author: elforestero
Reviews.Content: My third visit to this hotel. I just got back from Japan and was amused to find I could literally fit three of the hotel rooms I stayed in in Tokyo inside this single hotel room in Reseda. It's a big room even by US standards for the $70 to $80 range in which I usually find the rooms here through HOJO's website. The room is very clean and new-looking for a hotel in this price range too. A big downside is the hotel attracts a diverse crowd including people who walk the hallways without shirts on and people who throw all-night loud parties with what sounds like dozens of carousing people crammed into a single room and often opening the door letting the sound of the party travel through the area. There were constant streams of people from this party making tons of noise in the hallway all night. The walls or doors are very thin here so it seems like people making noise in the hallway or in a nearby room are in the room with me. Despite complaints, this party went on for quite some time before it got quiet in the hotel. When I checked in this time, the front desk clerk was on the phone with a guest having trouble with the internet and was giving the person the phone number of the hotel's internet service provider. I didn't think much of it at the time, but then I had huge problems with the internet for the entire 2 night stay here. Email and internet were dog slow. They have 7 different wifi signals you can join in the hotel, and I tried all of them many times for hours and nothing worked. When I called the front desk to ask for the internet service provider's number too, they wouldn't give it to me and said the connection was a little slow today but was otherwise working fine for them. It was unusable for me as most pages wouldn't load more than 1/10 of the content and emails wouldn't send. They basically just said there was nothing they could do about it and I should keep trying all the different wifi signals in the hotel until I found a solution to what they said was "my signal problem." I don't know if they realize people will actually not repeat their stay at a hotel if the internet is bad when they need to get work done. They acted like they didn't need to do anything about it. I wouldn't stay here again unless I don't need to have internet or am willing to go out of the hotel everytime I need to use it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel with very pleasant and accommodating staff.”
Reviews.Author: ettawebb
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with my stay at this hotel. The room was nicely furnished and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “The Lobby of a hotel says it all and this lobby says quality”
Reviews.Author: electroshock735
Reviews.Content: stayed here for our last four nights in los angeles. Had come across it on reviews on trip advisor. IT's only a short trip along the 101 freeway from holywood and even closer to universal studios and was so so so much cheaper than anywhere else. Due to the price my wife and I did not expect anything other than a roof over our heads Upon arriving and walking into the lobby our expectations were somewhat exceeded. It has a fantastic clean and well presented lobby which rivaled many classy hotels. Just this alone blew us away and we knew 110% we had made th right chocie. To get to the rooms you go through the lobby, outside into a kind of well presented court yard (secure and safe big +++) where there is a water feature, pool and heated hot tub. The rooms were ammaculate and spacious with flat screen tv with plenty of channel choices. They have a CVS drug store next door where you can get a few bits of food and drink if you wish and plenty of info on delivery food and take outs. The staff are great and helpful and the breakfast is a fantastic touch and available in the hotel lobby which is well spaced out with TV and plenty of seats. The only grip I had with this motel was the wifi which ran slower than dial up but on the whole that is such a minor point when the place is so spot on. I am planning on taking my sons to california next year and when we are in Los Angeles I will definitly be staying here. Safe, Clean, great value and location with brilliant presentation all round. Definitly a hidden gem of LA if not California

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: josemiguelgomez
Reviews.Content: This is for sure the best hotel in our 20 day visit to California. Clean and very comfortable room, nice location, close to Beverly Hills and Hollywood area. Free high speed wifi connection (working perfectly), nice breakfast included. Helpful, friendly and very professional staff (they help us with some problems we had with our reservation and find the best solution for us). Certainly I would recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't fault it, awesome.”
Reviews.Author: Sirda
Reviews.Content: Wonderful stay. Recently refurbished, clean, large room. Staff very helpful and friendly. We were travelling for almost 6 weeks staying at several hotels this has to be one of the best we stayed at. Nothing was too much trouble, the location was great, close to Universal studios, Hollywood, Venice Beach etc. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “All good.”
Reviews.Author: Petertopzand
Reviews.Content: A good clean room not too far from LA if driving. Good restaurants/bars/shops nearby. Good pricing. The only complaint I have was the breakfast which was free but crap. The Mexican joint over the raid does a carrot/orange juice mix for 5 bucks that is at least healthy.

Reviews.Title: “Great Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tristanr18
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for about ten days after my lease was up on my old place and I was awaiting to move into my new place. This place is great, the people are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are huge and very clean. For the cost it is a great value. The only drawback is the location but if you intend on visiting the valley then this place is a great choice. The employees are there to help and will do whatever is necessary to make sure that your satisfied. On one of the nights the single and double bedrooms were completely booked, however since the front desk clerk recognized me as a previous visitor he offered me the Presidential Suite at the same discounted rate my previous one bedroom was. You are not going to find service like that in 99% of hotels. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for our company needs”
Reviews.Author: motodad450
Reviews.Content: I have a project in Northridge for a few months and needed a hotel for my crew. The first one by the jobsite was Extended Stay. Booked for the week but after the first night checked out due to poor rooms and service. I came across the Howard Johnson and after speaking with the Manager and front desk staff, I knew this was the place. Great staff, good rooms, a pool and spa, and last but not least fresh cookies. Been here for a few months with zero complaints about hotel. Here's to another 2 months. Cheers!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A really pleasant hotel”
Reviews.Author: GarethSouthampton
Reviews.Content: Although this place is based in Reseda which is north of LA it is ideal if you have a car. My partner and I had a rented car whilst on our road trip and this was a great place to be situated. It took approx 15-20 mins by car to get to all the major places, and this hotel is based in a very quiet neighborhood which was ideal after a long day exploring what LA had to offer. Staff are very helpful, and breakfast was an ideal start to the day.

Reviews.Title: “got more than what we paid for.”
Reviews.Author: golfer-nut
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. The front desk staff was very helpful at check-in. While there was a wait they offered us cookies. Upon check-in they answered some question regarding areas of interest. The sales manager came out to direct us to many attraction for Los Angeles. Andy seem to care for all the guest that were there. Arriving into our room was a big surprise. We had just come from Las Vegas And had stayed at the Venetian Hotel. To fine this room finished with granite and the flat screen TV was a real surprise for the dollars spent at this hotel. The family was not expecting much but the rooms were very clean and had all the basis ammenities we needed. We would recommend this hotel if you are going to visit universal studios and the hollywood area. It was a bit further for disney land but we did not mind the extra drive for the one day. Great place and good valve.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Kym60
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights. We all slept well had a nice breakfast in the morning then out the door to discover LA. Found it close to Universal Studios, even not too far from Hollywood. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel, great staff, a little far from the action”
Reviews.Author: Garrettimus
Reviews.Content: IÂ´m from Brazil and justed stayed for 16 days in Hojo Reseda with a friend. The hotel is great, the staff is very friendly and professional. Breakfast is nice too. The hotel is not that close to the major attractions, but if you rent a car you will be OK since Freeway 101 is close by. The only issue, IMO, is the Fire Dept. thatÂ´s across the street - itÂ´s very noisy at times. All in all, Howard Johnson Inn & Suites Reseda is a GREAT place to stay. I recommend it strongly! Ao pessoal do Brasil, eu recomendo o hotel. Ã‰ imbativel no item custo/benefÃ­cio.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Very Good for a reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: burtpb
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a hotel that was inexpensive and allowed smoking (partner smokes). As with most places in suburbs of Los Angeles, you do need a car to get to most places from here but location is not bad, about 45 minutes to many areas of Los Angeles (not during rush hour of course). CVS drugstore is next door. We stayed in a regular room for 2 nights, it was clean, had a coffee maker, small refrigerator, TV, free wireless internet (a bit slow at times), free morning breakfast room (breads, danish, coffee, juice, etc.). Hotel has secured parking (gated, use room card to access) and parking is free. Even though it was a smoking room, the room smelled fresh. We paid about $75 a night plus tax, substantially less than most other hotels around Los Angeles and a very good value. No complaints - check-in was easy, daily maid service, etc. You aren't getting a luxury room for this rate of course but it's more than you might get at budget hotels at around the same rate. Hotel is within 5-10 minutes of the 101 and 118 Highways. We traveled to Pasadena and Malibu and this hotel location was a good compromise for location and price. I would recommend this hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “four star quality at two star price”
Reviews.Author: phildiann
Reviews.Content: why pay silly prices for big hotels this place had everything you need for a pleasureable stay, the room was very clean a little dated but we had a fridge,coffee maker,LCD TV,air-con,and clean towels every day,free parking, free breakfast and a pool to relax in, the staff were very helpful and curtious nothing was to much trouble, so next time your in L.A. checkout this great little hotel we will certainly be staying there again

Reviews.Title: “Cheap motel convenient for north LA”
Reviews.Author: mpkljp2011
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three nights for sightseeing in LA and Universal Studios. We were a bit apprehensive about the location when we drove up to the motel but realised after that it was not an issue. We didn't however feel inclined to go walking around the area after dark. The parking was in a secure area behind a gate at the back of the motel. The room was clean and spacious and met our needs. The swimming pool was adequate for a quick swim. There is a supermarket right next door which was convenient. The only issue we had with our stay was the fuss made when I asked for three extra pillows and was told rather curtly that only one extra pillow per room was allowed! Breakfast was good and served in the spacious lobby. Overall happy with stay based on the fact that the price was very good.

Reviews.Title: “Expected average, but got below average.”
Reviews.Author: Karoboo
Reviews.Content: OK hotel, not the cleanest, awful buzzing in room. Room 262 Very loud guests (teenagers throwing each othe rin the pool at 1am) , hotel staff do nothing about this. Would not stay here again. Recommend spending a bit more money and staying somewhere much nicer.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Good Value Stay”
Reviews.Author: RichardW99
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Howard Johnson Reseda for 4 nights in July. We went to this hotel on the basis of the very favourable reviews on Trip Advisor and I have to say we were very pleased. We pre-booked some months in advance and were able to get 20% off plus we reserved adjoining rooms with a connecting door (rooms 205 & 206). Specific points of note: - Location to the N of LA. Ideal for Universal, Hollywood and Getty but too far for Disney! - Not the best area in the world but providing you have a car not a problem - Secure and free parking! - Friendly and helpful staff - Large clean rooms and very comfortable beds - Free breakfast ideal. Not a vast choice but toast, bagels, cereal, tea and coffee and certainly enough to get us going each day. It's easy to be picky and find faults (there are always some) but remember this is only a 2* hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, nicely designed, quiet, comfortable bed, GREAT VALUE”
Reviews.Author: WestMarinMan
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a very clean, very reasonably priced (around $80) place to stay in the LA valley, then this is a great place. VERY clean, newly redecorated, comfortable bed, nice bathroom, good A/C. Reseda isn't exactly in the middle of the action, but it is close to the freeway and easy to get around. FREE GATED PARKING. You'd be hard pressed to find a nicer room for less in LA.

Reviews.Title: “Nice economical place to stay”
Reviews.Author: aayalaTucson_AZ
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this location because of the vicinity to Universal City (15 miles) and the economical price.The rooms were large as were the bathrooms. Once stayed at the Sheridan in San Diego and only one person could use the bathroom at one time. Pool is small but refreshing and the breakfast was nice and with the gated parking lot very secure. Easy access to Highway 1 and Santa Monica as well, very scenic drive! Would stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “We had a large room that was comfortable, clean, and quiet; newly remodeled”
Reviews.Author: MommaT94530
Reviews.Content: We were in town to tour Cal State Northridge and wanted a hotel close to the campus. This hotel was newly remodeled, our room was comfortable, clean and quiet. The staff was friendly and helpful and we appreciated the breakfast, which we ate in the outside courtyard. The parking lot was secure with an automatic gate. We would recommend this hotel to anyone, and if our child chooses to attend CSU Northridge we'll stay at Howard Johnson Reseda often.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: thkosan
Reviews.Content: What a great value for anyone traveling with a child. The room was very large with two flat screen televisions -- one in the bedroom and one in the living room. Not the cleanest room I've been in and maybe a bit worn around the edges, but the price was looooowww and we got a lot of room for the money. We were visiting family, so the location was excellent for us. I think for a tourist this may not be the best spot unless you don't mind a lot of driving.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Stay”
